name: Burning Blood
desc: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

name: Cracked Core
desc: At the Start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.

name: Pure Water
desc: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle to your hand.

name: Ring of the Snake
desc: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Akabeko
desc: Your first attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

name: Anchor
desc: Start each combat with 10 Block.

name: Ancient Tea Set
desc: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 extra Energy.

name: Art of War
desc: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

name: Bag of Marbles
desc: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

name: Bag of Preparation
desc: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Blood Vial
desc: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

name: Bronze Scales
desc: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

name: Centennial Puzzle
desc: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

name: Ceramic Fish
desc: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 gold.

name: Damaru
desc: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.

name: Data Disk
desc: Start each combat with 1 Focus.

name: Dream Catcher
desc: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.

name: Happy Flower
desc: Every 3 turns, gain 1 Energy.

name: Juzu Bracelet
desc: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

name: Lantern
desc: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

name: Maw Bank
desc: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at the shop.

name: Meal Ticket
desc: Whenever you enter a shop room, heal 15 HP.

name: Nunchaku
desc: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.

name: Oddly Smooth Stone
desc: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Omamori
desc: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.

name: Orichalcum
desc: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

name: Pen Nib
desc: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

name: Potion Belt
desc: Upon pickup, gain 2 Potion slots.

name: Preserved Insect
desc: Enemies in Elite rooms have 25% less HP.

name: Red Skull
desc: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

name: Regal Pillow
desc: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.

name: Smiling Mask
desc: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

name: Snecko Skull
desc: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.

name: Strawberry
desc: Raise your Max HP by 7.

name: The Boot
desc: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5.

name: Tiny Chest
desc: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.

name: Toy Ornithopter
desc: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.

name: Vajra
desc: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

name: War Paint
desc: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.

name: Whetstone
desc: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.

name: Blue Candle
desc: Curse cards can now be played. Playing a Curse will make you lose 1 HP and Exhausts the card.

name: Bottled Flame
desc: Upon pick up, choose an Attack card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

name: Bottled Lightning
desc: Upon pick up, choose a Skill card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

name: Bottled Tornado
desc: Upon pick up, choose a Power card. At the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand.

name: Darkstone Periapt
desc: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

name: Duality
desc: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Icon Dexterity.png Dexterity.

name: Eternal Feather
desc: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

name: Frozen Egg
desc: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Gold-Plated Cables
desc: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.

name: Gremlin Horn
desc: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card.

name: Horn Cleat
desc: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.

name: Ink Bottle
desc: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.

name: Kunai
desc: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Letter Opener
desc: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Matryoshka
desc: The next 2 chests you open contain 2 Relics. (Excludes boss chests)

name: Meat on the Bone
desc: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Mercury Hourglass
desc: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Molten Egg
desc: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Mummified Hand
desc: Whenever you play a Power, a random card in your hand costs 0 for the turn.

name: Ninja Scroll
desc: Start each combat with 3 Shivs in hand.

name: Ornamental Fan
desc: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

name: Pantograph
desc: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP.

name: Paper Krane
desc: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.

name: Paper Phrog
desc: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

name: Pear
desc: Raise your Max HP by 10.

name: Question Card
desc: On future Card Reward screens you have 1 additional card to choose from.

name: Self-Forming Clay
desc: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.

name: Shuriken
desc: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

name: Singing Bowl
desc: When adding cards to your deck, you may gain +2 Max HP instead.

name: Strike Dummy
desc: Cards containing "Strike" deal 3 additional damage.

name: Sundial
desc: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.

name: Symbiotic Virus
desc: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.

name: Teardrop Locket
desc: Start each combat in Calm.

name: The Courier
desc: The merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.

name: Toxic Egg
desc: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: White Beast Statue
desc: Potions always drop after combat.

name: Bird-Faced Urn
desc: Whenever you play a Power, heal 2 HP.

name: Calipers
desc: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

name: Captain's Wheel
desc: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

name: Champion Belt
desc: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

name: Charon's Ashes
desc: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Cloak Clasp
desc: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Icon Block.png block for each card in your hand.

name: Dead Branch
desc: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

name: Du-Vu Doll
desc: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.

name: Emotion Chip
desc: At the start of each turn, if you took any damage last turn, trigger the passive ability of all your Orbs.

name: Fossilized Helix
desc: Prevent the first time you would lose HP in combat.

name: Gambling Chip
desc: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards then draw that many.

name: Ginger
desc: You can no longer become Weakened.

name: Girya
desc: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites. (3 times max)

name: Golden Eye
desc: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.

name: Ice Cream
desc: Energy is now conserved between turns.

name: Incense Burner
desc: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.

name: Lizard Tail
desc: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

name: Magic Flower
desc: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

name: Mango
desc: Raise your Max HP by 14.

name: Old Coin
desc: Gain 300 Gold.

name: Peace Pipe
desc: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.

name: Pocketwatch
desc: Whenever you play 3 or less cards in a turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

name: Prayer Wheel
desc: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.

name: Shovel
desc: You can now Dig for loot at Rest Sites.

name: Stone Calendar
desc: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.

name: The Specimen
desc: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.

name: Thread and Needle
desc: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.

name: Tingsha
desc: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

name: Torii
desc: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.

name: Tough Bandages
desc: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

name: Tungsten Rod
desc: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

name: Turnip
desc: You can no longer become Frail.

name: Unceasing Top
desc: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

name: Wing Boots
desc: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.

name: Astrolabe
desc: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

name: Black Blood
desc: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Black Star
desc: Elites now drop 2 Relics when defeated.

name: Busted Crown
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. On Card Reward screens, you have 2 fewer cards to choose from

name: Calling Bell
desc: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics.

name: Coffee Dripper
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites

name: Cursed Key
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a non-boss chest, obtain a Curse.

name: Ectoplasm
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

name: Empty Cage
desc: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

name: Frozen Core
desc: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end your turn with empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.

name: Fusion Hammer
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

name: Holy Water
desc: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles to your hand.

name: Hovering Kite
desc: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy.

name: Inserter
desc: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.

name: Mark of Pain
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Start combats with 2 Wounds in your draw pile.

name: Nuclear Battery
desc: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.

name: Pandora's Box
desc: Transform all Strikes and Defends.

name: Philosopher's Stone
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 1 Strength.

name: Ring of the Serpent
desc: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

name: Runic Cube
desc: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

name: Runic Dome
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy Intents.

name: Runic Pyramid
desc: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

name: Sacred Bark
desc: Double the effectiveness of potions.

name: Slaver's Collar
desc: During Boss and Elite combats, gain Energy at the start of your turn.

name: Snecko Eye
desc: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.

name: Sozu
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain potions.

name: Tiny House
desc: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 Random card.

name: Velvet Choker
desc: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

name: Violet Lotus
desc: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional Energy.

name: Wrist Blade
desc: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.

name: Bloody Idol
desc: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.

name: Cultist Headpiece
desc: You feel more talkative.

name: Enchiridion
desc: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 until the end of turn.

name: Face of Cleric
desc: Raise your Max HP by 1 after each combat.

name: Golden Idol
desc: Enemies drop 25% more Gold.

name: Gremlin Visage
desc: Start each combat with 1 Weak.

name: Mark of the Bloom
desc: You can no longer heal.

name: Mutagenic Strength
desc: Start each combat with 3 Strength that is lost at the end of your turn.

name: N'loth's Hungry Face
desc: The next non-boss chest you open is empty.

name: Necronomicon
desc: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. When you take this relic, become Cursed.

name: Neow's Lament
desc: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.

name: Nilry's Codex
desc: At the end of each turn, you can choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

name: Nloth's Gift
desc: Triples the chance of receiving rare cards as monster rewards.

name: Odd Mushroom
desc: When Vulnerable, take 25% more damage rather than 50%.

name: Red Mask
desc: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

name: Spirit Poop
desc: It's unpleasant.

name: Ssserpent Head
desc: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.

name: Warped Tongs
desc: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

name: Brimstone
desc: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.

name: Cauldron
desc: When obtained, brews 5 random potions.

name: Chemical X
desc: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.

name: Clockwork Souvenir
desc: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact.

name: Dolly's Mirror
desc: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.

name: Frozen Eye
desc: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

name: Hand Drill
desc: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

name: Lee's Waffle
desc: Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

name: Medical Kit
desc: Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status will Exhaust the card.

name: Melange
desc: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.

name: Membership Card
desc: 50% discount on all products!

name: Orange Pellets
desc: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your Debuffs.

name: Orrery
desc: Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

name: Prismatic Shard
desc: Combat reward screens now contain colorless cards and cards from other colors.

name: Runic Capacitor
desc: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.

name: Sling of Courage
desc: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

name: Strange Spoon
desc: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

name: The Abacus
desc: Gain 6 Block whenever you shuffle your draw pile.

name: Toolbox
desc: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.

name: Twisted Funnel
desc: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.
